policy.name: BFI DPX metadata conformance checker
policy.description: Test if DPX file in a sequence conforms to RAWcooked and BFI mandatory metadata requirements. Checks DPX file has correct formatting, correct extension and metadata fields populated. Checks for and fails two image elements, and any colorspace not RGB (Descriptor 50) or Y (Descriptor 6). Checks 10 or 16-bit, minimum 2K width, image is Raw and lossless, square pixel etc. Handles variation DPX image metadata displaying as either Image or Video tracktype.
